ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: To keep this whole concept on topic, I d like to start a survey of system specs vs. apparent performance. Just fill in the blanks and let s share what works
ygData.messageBody:
To keep this whole concept on topic, I'd like to start a survey of system
specs vs. apparent performance.
Just fill in the blanks and let's share what works and what doesn't!

Computer Specs for Bards

CPU:PII 350
RAM:96mb
Video Card (and RAM):VooDoo 3 2000
Video Resolution:640x480
Sound Card:SB live
HD speed (rpm):7200
'Net speed:DSL
Geographic Location:Fayetteville, AR
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing:yes
Particle Effects:yes
Mip Mapping:no
Clip plane distance:50%

How many songs can you twist?3 but usually only 2
Do you slow down when it rains?No
How about in Unrest or Kunark?No Problem




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
